contentList.content: - Drag and drop items to the bag to add them to the list of automatically sold items. - Open the bag to edit your list - Removing an item from the bag in edit mode will remove it from the list and save it - The list is saved once you close the bag
By magic's embrace, the item fades without a trace, in its stead, a golden grace. For adventurers in haste, a boon, a path to wealth they chase!
